tool.name: GFF3 Add Gene to CDS
tool.description: is one step of fixing a gene model--adding parent gene features to CDSs
tool.help:
..class:: warningmark
This tool is incredibly naive. It does not think. It will find ALL CDSs (nothing else), wipe out the existing set of genes, and add replace with a gene-mRNA-cds model. This is **probably** not what you want to do
